original_text: People were talking about Jesus. King Herod heard about what was happening. Some people were saying that Jesus was really John the Baptist. They said that John had died, but he had become alive again. ‘That is why this man can do these very powerful things,’ they said.
korean_text: 이에 예수의 이름이 드러난지라 헤롯 왕이 듣고 이르되 이는 세례 요한이 죽은 자 가운데서 살아났도다 그러므로 이런 능력이 그 속에서 일어나느니라 하고

sentences.original_text: King Herod heard about what was happening.
sentences.korean_translation: 헤롯 왕은 일어나고 있는 일에 대해 듣고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: that Jesus was really John the Baptist.
They said that John had died,
but he had become alive again.
this man can do these very powerful things,'
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람이 이렇게 아주 강력한 일들을 할 수 있는,'
